=== Integer Casting E2E Tests ===

--- Section 1: Basic int declarations ---
x = 10
y = 20
z = 30

--- Section 2: int + literal arithmetic ---
x + 1 = 11
y + 2 = 22
z + 100 = 130

--- Section 3: int + int arithmetic ---
x + y = 30
y + z = 50
x + y + z = 60

--- Section 4: Declared type int ---
g (int) = 30
h (int) = 33
i (int) = 11

--- Section 5: Redundant as int ---
(x as int) + (y as int) = 30
(x as int) + (y as int) (inferred) = 30
((x + y) as int) + z = 60

--- Section 6: Subtraction ---
x - 5 = 5
y - x = 10
z - 10 = 20

--- Section 7: Multiplication ---
x * 2 = 20
x * y = 200
y * 3 = 60

--- Section 8: Division ---
y / x = 2
z / 10 = 3
100 / 3 = 33

--- Section 9: Modulo ---
z % x = 0
25 % 7 = 4

--- Section 10: Unary minus ---
-x = -10
-(5 as int) = -5

--- Section 11: Complex expressions ---
(x + y) * z = 610
x + y * z = 610
(x + 1) * (y + 2) = 32
((x+y) as int) * ((y+z) as int) = 440

--- Section 12: Chained operations ---
x + 1 + 2 + 3 = 16
x * 2 + y * 3 = 80
x + y + z + 100 = 160

--- Section 13: Comparisons ---
x < y = True
x > 5 = True
y <= z = True
x >= 10 = True
x === 10 = True
y !== z = True

--- Section 14: Assignment operators ---
counter after +1 = 1
counter after +10 = 11
counter after *2 = 22

--- Section 15: Function boundaries ---
addInts(x, y) = 30
multiplyByTwo(z) = 60
increment(x) = 11

--- Section 16: Array indexing ---
arr[idx] = two
arr[idx + 1] = three

=== All tests completed ===
